tasks.title: Set up project Structure
tasks.description: Initialize a new React app and install all required dependencies

tasks.title: Build the main UI components
tasks.description: Create a reusable Card, Button, and Modal component.

tasks.title: Implement basic CRUD functionality
tasks.description: Enable users to create, read, update, and delete tasks without optimistic updates first.

tasks.title: Create a language switcher for the app
tasks.description: For task management application create a language switcher with 2 languages (ge/en).

tasks.title: Create a light/dark theme option for the application
tasks.description: Light and dark themes for the application should be implemented, but the default device preferences should be taken in mind.
